title: Album Page, "Sketches of Belfry at Honfleur, France", late 19th century
medium: Graphite on very smooth, off-white wove paper tipped into binding with fabric
inscribed: Recto, in graphite, lower right corner (perpendicular to drawing): 92; lower center (parallel to drawing): Belfry at / Honfleur.
dimensions: Sheet: 19.8 x 29.8 cm (7 13/16 x 11 3/4 in.), irregular
description: Horizontal sheet tipped vertically into binding so that the top edge of the drawing is the right side of the sheet.  Depicted on the sheet are a view in plan and elevation with measurements of the interior structure of a belfry with pulley and bells represented.  The verso has a small, light sketch of a paneled element, like a belfry cap, topped by a small finial.

tombstone.epitaph:
Album Page, "Sketches of Belfry at Honfleur, France", late 19th century.
late 19th century. Graphite on very smooth, off-white wove paper tipped into binding with fabric. Gift of Mrs. William Greenough. 1943-51-267.
